game.name: Fragile Frontier
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 창작마당, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, 통계, Steam 순위표, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A chaotic 1-4 player co-op physics delivery game where owls race across Moonperch Island with packages stacked on their car roofs! Hit a bump too hard and watch your cargo scatter. Hop out, grab your packages, and get back on the road. Help friends recover their dropped deliveries!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A chaotic 1-4 player co-op physics delivery game where owls race across Moonperch Island with packages stacked on their car roofs! Hit a bump too hard and watch your cargo scatter. Hop out, grab your packages, and get back on the road. Help friends recover their dropped deliveries!
